entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 06:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.4°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
